sense.def:
To readjust
ali
to readjust oneself
pomeni spremeniti svoje vedênje tako, da ustreza spremenjenim okoliščinam.

seg.quote: It is difficult to readjust to changing environments.
The applicants readjust themselves to meet the availability of university places.

sense.def:
To readjust something
pomeni spremeniti položaj ali lego nečesa.

seg.quote: He readjusted the saddle before getting on.
